testcase.name: Updating user status as librarian should change current user status in DB
testcase.system-out: Given the user logged in as "librarian".....................................passed And the user navigates to "Users" page......................................passed When the user clicks Edit User button.......................................passed And the user changes user status "ACTIVE" to "INACTIVE".....................passed And the user clicks save changes button.....................................passed Then "The user updated." message should appear..............................passed And the users should see same status for related user in database...........passed And the user changes current user status "INACTIVE" to "ACTIVE".............passed
